text: George Lockhart of Tarbrax was a son of Sir Allan Lockhart of Cleghorn. He married Anne Lockhart of Tarbrax daughter of Sir James Lockhart of Lee. They lived at Tarbrax Castle and had a son William Lockhart of Tarbrax and a daughter Anne, who became Countess of Aberdeen.historyofparliamentonline.org, Gordon, William, Lord Haddo (1679-1745). From 1647 he was Commissary of Glasgow, according to the Lockhart papers in the National Archives of Scotland (NAS GD 33 & GD 118); or from May 1646 to October 1658. Died October 1658. == References == * Edinburgh Parliament commissioning of George Lockhart of Tarbrax The Records of the Parliaments of Scotland to 1707, K.M. Brown et al eds (St Andrews, 2007-2019), 1646/11/374. Date accessed: 7 August 2019. ==Notes== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1658 deaths Category:People from South Lanarkshire Category:Politics of Glasgow
title: George Lockhart of Tarbrax
